meanings.definition: A reproduction of a document made by using a photocopier.
meanings.sent1: I made a photocopy of the important paper.
meanings.sent2: The office has a photocopy machine for duplicating documents.
meanings.sent3: The photocopy of the contract was so clear, it looked like the original!
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a photocopy, perfectly replicating every detail.
meanings.sent5: The photocopy revealed a hidden message written in invisible ink.

meanings.definition: To reproduce a document by using a photocopier.
meanings.sent1: Please photocopy these papers for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: I will photocopy the report for distribution.
meanings.sent3: He tried to photocopy his face as a joke, but it didn't turn out well.
meanings.sent4: The artist's goal was to photocopy reality in a surreal way.
meanings.sent5: She decided to photocopy the map to have a backup in case she got lost.
